alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 8:01PM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers overnight and through the day Tuesday becoming steady snow Tuesday night. expected. Total snow accumulations generally ranging from 3 to 6 inches, with lesser amounts below 6000 feet and locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. Southwest winds gusting to around 40 mph at times. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 5 AM Tuesday to 5 AM Wednesday: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 6 to 10 inches Show Low 4 to 8 inches Whiteriver 2 to 4 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
